thread.title: Dks services

author: Dks services
title: Dks services
text: Booked a complete new set of tyres had a email giving me the arrival time that time was spot on to the minute was greeted by the fitter who was very professional he asked a few questions the got on with the job no fussing or moaning. He was very efficient and quick then he checked our other vechicals within the household and advised me on there tyre wear with no sales pressure which was very welcomed
